ygData.msgSnippet: * BrightBlade growled as she realized that the escaping foam was doing nothing, no systems had been shorted out. She cursed but had little time to do anything

* BrightBlade growled as she realized that the escaping foam was doing 
nothing, no systems had been shorted out. She cursed but had little time to 
do anything else as the door unsealed, snapping her head towards the door 
and shielding her eyes with her hand from the light that filtered in as it 
opened.
Cold and soaked from the sprinkler systems she was enveloped in light, 
snarling at the fact that she had been found out.
She took her hand from her eyes but had no time to react as she was suddenly 
hit by something, slamming her back against the wall and knocking her head 
back to his it as well.
But instead of being able to simply stand to see what was the matter other 
rapid shots pinned her to the wall, taking one after the other in the chest 
plate. Her cloaking device short-circuiting due to the wetness. The air 
around her shimmering until she was no longer cloaked, the cloaker on her 
hip now useless.
Finally the shots ended but then she was suddenly shot a few times in the 
knees. Them bucking and causing her to fall to them and her hands, the water 
around her hands and legs turning red with her own mech-fluid.
BrightBlade shook from cold and shock, her system wracked with damage and 
pain.
She slowly looked up towards the door, her face splattered with her own 
fluid.
It was a Maximal, his cannon aimed at her, not realizing before but he had 
charged and it was his shots that had gotten her.
A bit of mech-fluid came up her throat but she didn�t notice, it leaking out 
of her open mouth as she squinted towards Firearm, shaking.
She lifted one of her hands from the floor and touched it to her chest, then 
looking at the shaking hand as it dripped fluid, simply setting it back onto 
the floor to support her weight again.
Rex�s words almost seemed as if they were far away, her squinting eyes 
trying to focus on his back shape against the blinding light of the doorway.
BrightBlade groaned and took in a breath and coughed, slowly getting to her 
feet but clinging to the wall to make sure that she didn�t fall.
She had been shot down before she had had a chance to do anything, these 
Maximals had gotten better.
But there was just one hitch, she was unarmed. She had had no room for 
weapons with all the gadgets she had brought. But she had completed her 
mission and had gotten the data. She was done.
Even if she was captured now she would find a way to get away, there was no 
chance in the Pit that they could take all of her devices from her.
BrightBlade looked towards Firearm and Rex as they stood before her, a 
pained but helpless look in her face. Noticing that Smokescreen and Grimmler 
had joined them as well.
But then her expression changer to one of defiance, she had won over them 
whether they knew it or not.
Even now the data would be analyzed and accepted. She had seceded.
BrightBlade looked towards Rex with a smile on her face, wrenching as her 
chest sparked and her knees gave out. She fell to her knees and looked up at 
them.*

� What are you going to do, shoot me?!�

* She was unarmed and she was riding on the fact that Maximals wouldn�t 
attack her if they knew, but some didn�t. She would have to see.*
